name: Robot friend
description:
Use your robot friend to solve 5 different puzzles.

Your robot companion can activate pressure plates, carry crates to the next flag and even say some funny things (sometimes).

| Controls: 

• Left Click - Place Flag

• Right Click - Make robot go to next flag

• "R" to reset Level

| Your Robot:

• Can Activate pressure plates by flying over them

• Can pick up crates when there's a flag besides it

• Drop the crate on the next flag (Crates activate pressure plates)

Making of: Soon

Please note that the levels aren't very hard. I put way too much time into polishing that I had almost no time to come up with levels :D I will maybe add more in the future.
